content:
@Eryk Kulikowski just demoed a DDI-CDI previewer/editor and exporter he created. I just posted this to the google group:

At today's community call, Dataverse core developer Eryk Kulikowski treated us to a demo of a DDI-CDI previewer/editor/exporter he's been working on:

  • recording (skip to 29:00):Â https://harvard.zoom.us/rec/share/P4-RNQEb6NPgz0KmQy95uFxvT0M15Oq1GBoT6DqvVqAap838GHv3lt2U3UPJdE9-.fJtlFdpsgE84oh98
  • notes:Â https://docs.google.com/document/d/1LARAZMGSbAAqEz_o3HMNrXqsoLZRmsKqleBoPTazyXE/edit?usp=sharing
  • previewer:Â https://github.com/gdcc/dataverse-previewers/pull/133
  • exporter:Â https://github.com/gdcc/exporter-transformer#ddi-cdi-cross-domain-integration
